name: Static-combo
tagline: A Taobao.com-style combo handler in Node.js.
body:
# Static Combo Server -------------- A Taobao.com-style combo handler in Node.js. ## Install ### Install PM2 ``` npm install pm2 -g ``` PM2 is a production process manager for Node.js applications with a built-in load balancer. It allows you to keep applications alive forever, to reload them without downtime and to facilitate common system admin tasks. ### Install node module ``` npm install ``` ## Start Combo This is the default configuration.Modify the configuration according to the static directory of your project. ``` { "port": 3333, "dev": { "port": 3000, "assetsPath": "./test/" }, "assetsPath": "./test/", "combo_str":"??", "combo_split":"," } ``` **Start combo server in the production environment.** ``` sh bin/run.sh ``` **Start combo server in the development environment** ``` NODE_ENV=development pm2 start lib/init.js -i max -n combo ``` ## Demo ```html Test Combo
